name.description: The name of the tool to be called.

description.description: Injects data-testid attributes into React components in a specified project.

files.description: Optional. A list of specific file paths to process.

include.description: Optional. A list of glob patterns to include for processing.

exclude.description: Optional. A list of glob patterns to exclude from processing.

strategy.description: Optional. The ID generation strategy. Can be 'safe-hash' or 'functional'.

json_output.description: Required. Must be true to return machine-readable JSON output.
